div.p: Dr. Kyle Heath has been the administrative leader of Cleburne ISD since 2014 and has more than 30 years of service in education as a secondary teacher, campus principal and district administrator.

a.title: Go to comments for Meet the Superintendent

div.p: Stay current with CISD news through monthly videos featuring construction progress at Cleburne High School, in-depth coverage of campus events and activities, and achievements of our students.

a.title: Go to comments for CISD Matters

div.p: With 6,700 students on 11 campuses served by more than 1,000 teachers and staff, there’s a lot to learn about our district. Here’s a great place to start!

a.title: Go to comments for Demographics & Statistics

span.div: Texas Tax Code section 26.05(b)(2) requires the District to post the following statement:
The Cleburne Independent School District ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE.
